data.title: Gene Hackman (Actor)
data.meta_description: Profile of actor Gene Hackman with biographical facts, historical events and Gene Hackman's married life.
data.text:
Gene Hackman

Profession: Actor

Biography: The French Connection, Unforgiven, Superman: The Movie

Born: January 30, 1930

Birthplace: San Bernardino, California, USA

Age: 94 years old

Generation: Silent Generation

Chinese Zodiac: Horse

Star Sign: Aquarius

Historical Events

"The French Connection" directed by William Friedkin and starring Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider and Fernando Rey premieres in the US (Academy Awards Best Picture 1972)

29th Golden Globes: "The French Connection", Gene Hackman, & Jane Fonda win

44th Academy Awards: "The French Connection", Gene Hackman & Jane Fonda win

"The Poseidon Adventure", starring Gene Hackman, Ernest Borgnine, Shelley Winters and Jack Albertson premieres in NYC

"Superman: The Movie", directed by Richard Donner and starring Christopher Reeve, Marlon Brando, Gene Hackman and Margot Kidder premieres at the Uptown Theater in Washington, D.C.

Ariel Dorfman's stage drama "Death and the Maiden", starring Glenn Close, Richard Dreyfuss, and Gene Hackman, and directed by Mike Nichols, opens at the Brooks Atkinson Theatre, NYC; runs for 159 performances

Ariel Dorfman's stage drama "Death and the Maiden", starring Glenn Close, Richard Dreyfuss, and Gene Hackman, and directed by Mike Nichols, closes at the Brooks Atkinson Theatre, NYC, after 159 performances

"Unforgiven" directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman and Morgan Freeman premieres in Los Angeles (Academy Awards Best Picture 1993)

Personal Life

American actor Gene Hackman (25) weds Fay Maltese; divorce in 1986

Famous Actors

Alan Hale Jr.

Aziz Ansari

Buster Keaton

Cuba Gooding Jr.

Neil Patrick Harris

Robert Wagner
